segments.text: I'm observing this everyday kitchen setup quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is at the sink area, focused on drying a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, and water is filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's starting to spill over the edge slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming beneath her on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the issue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a young boy uses a step stool to reach up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears unsteady under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's accessing the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands close, extending her arm toward it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating to get some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's busier than I expected with these elements.
segments.speaker: PAR
